welcome:
👋 *Welcome, {name}!*

I'm your *Personalized Post Bot* - I help you cut through information overload by curating news from your favorite Telegram channels.

🎯 *How it works:*
1. You train me by rating posts
2. I learn your preferences
3. You get a personalized feed

Ready to start?
welcome_back:
👋 *Welcome back, {name}!*

Your personalized feed is ready. Check out the latest posts tailored just for you!
training_intro:
🎯 *Let's Train Your Feed!*

I'll show you posts from a few channels. Rate them to help me understand what you like.

📊 *Training includes:*
• 2 default news channels
• 1 channel of your choice (optional)

The more you rate, the better I get at finding content you'll love!
resume_training:
🔄 *Resume Training*

You have an incomplete training session. Would you like to continue where you left off?
how_it_works:
ℹ️ *How Personalized Post Bot Works*

1️⃣ *Training Phase*
   Rate posts with 👍 or 👎 to teach me your preferences

2️⃣ *Learning*
   My AI analyzes your ratings to understand your interests

3️⃣ *Personalization*
   I filter and rank posts based on what you like

4️⃣ *Your Feed*
   Get the most relevant posts delivered to you

🎁 *Bonus:* Complete training to unlock 1 free premium channel!
add_channel_prompt:
➕ *Add Your Channel*

Send me the username of a Telegram channel you want to include in training.

*Format:* @channel_name or https://t.me/channel_name

_Note: The channel must be public._
training_complete:
🎉 *Training Complete!*

You've rated *{rated_count}* posts. Your personalized feed is being prepared!

🎁 *Bonus Unlocked:* You can now add 1 free bonus channel!
bonus_channel:
🎁 *Claim Your Bonus Channel!*

As a thank you for completing training, you get to add one premium channel for free.

This channel will be included in your personalized feed with priority ranking.
feed_ready:
📰 *Your Feed is Ready!*

I've analyzed your preferences and prepared your personalized content. You'll see the most relevant posts here.

Use the buttons below to manage your channels and settings.

_The more you interact, the smarter I get!_
retention_nudge:
👋 *Hey! Miss you!*

I found a post you might love. Check it out!
help:
🆘 *Help*

*Commands:*
• /start - Start or restart the bot
• /status - Check your current status
• /reset - Clean up messages
• /help - Show this help

*Need more help?*
Contact support: @your_support_bot
error_generic: ❌ Something went wrong. Please try again later.
no_posts_training: ❌ No posts found. Please try again later or add a different channel.
feed_empty:
📫 No new posts in your feed yet.

Check back later or add more channels!
invalid_channel_username: ❌ Please enter a valid channel username (e.g., @channel_name)
invalid_channel_username_short: ❌ Please enter a valid channel username
bonus_channel_added:
🎉 Bonus channel {username} added successfully!

Your personalized feed is now ready!
already_have_bonus: ❌ You've already claimed your bonus channel!
cannot_access_channel: ❌ Could not access channel {username}. Make sure the channel is public and the username is correct.
enter_bonus_channel: 🎁 Enter the username of your bonus channel (e.g., @channel_name):
enter_channel_feed: ➕ Enter the channel username to add (e.g., channel\_name or link):
no_user_channels: 📋 You haven't added any channels yet.
retrain_not_ready: You need a few more likes/dislikes before I can improve your recommendations. Rate some posts in your feed and try again.
retrain_success: ✅ Done! I've updated your recommendations based on your latest ratings (took {training_time}s).
bonus_training_intro: Now let's quickly train your feed on your bonus channel {username}. Rate a few posts to improve recommendations.
bonus_training_no_posts: ❌ No posts with captions were found in your bonus channel {username} yet. We'll keep an eye on it.
